document.full_text: citigroup inc  on thursday sought to dismiss an effort by lehman brothers  to recover $1 billion in collateral that the investment bank was forced to post when it was teetering on bankruptcy in the fall of 2008.
document.title: citi seeks to keep $1 billion lehman collateral
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  on thursday sought to dismiss an effort by lehman brothers  to recover $1 billion in collateral that the investment bank was forced to post when it was teetering on bankruptcy in the fall of 2008.
